name: Peace Lily
short_description: Elegant white blooms with calming greenery.
description: Peace Lily is a graceful indoor plant known for its air-purifying qualities and soft white flowers. Perfect for creating a calm, peaceful atmosphere at home or as a thoughtful sympathy gift.

name: Snake Plant
short_description: Bold, modern leaves with minimal care.
description: Snake Plant is a resilient indoor favorite with upright, sword-like leaves. It thrives with little attention, making it ideal for busy lifestyles and modern interiors.

name: Monstera Deliciosa
short_description: Statement plant with iconic split leaves.
description: Monstera Deliciosa brings tropical elegance to any space. Its large, glossy leaves make it a bold decorative plant loved by interior designers.

name: ZZ Plant
description: ZZ Plant is almost indestructible, thriving in low light and requiring very little water. A perfect gift for beginners or office desks.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Aloe Vera is both decorative and functional, known for its soothing gel and minimal care needs. Ideal for sunny windowsills.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
short_description: Tall, dramatic leaves for modern homes.
description: Fiddle Leaf Fig adds architectural elegance with its large violin-shaped leaves. Best suited for bright spaces with a touch of care.

name: Pothos Golden
description: Golden Pothos is a fast-growing vine that looks beautiful in hanging pots or shelves. It’s forgiving and great for beginners.

name: Rubber Plant
short_description: Deep green leaves with modern appeal.
description: Rubber Plant features thick, glossy leaves that make a bold yet calming statement. Great for contemporary interiors.

name: Calathea Orbifolia
short_description: Soft patterned leaves with gentle charm.
description: Calathea Orbifolia is admired for its large, patterned leaves and graceful presence. A perfect choice for plant lovers who enjoy nurturing.

name: Mini Succulent Trio
description: This Mini Succulent Trio includes three assorted succulents arranged beautifully. Perfect for desks, shelves, or gifting small moments of joy.
